Room.Name: Green Wagon
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a wagon with several card players around a gaming table.
Room.LongDescription: The players look up as you enter, but go back to their game as you stand here. A short, very fat man sits alone in a corner and stares at you as he slowly strokes a strange animal in his lap. The animal is a cross between a lynx and an elven cat, and apparently does not like you. The lynxven is brightly colored with tassled ears and sabre teeth.
